title: Increase in supply of loanable funds-ForEx-exports

content.question: Assume that the supply of loanable funds increases in Country X. The international value of Country X’s currency and Country X’s exports will most likely change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: International Value of Country X's Currency Country X's Exports Decrease Decrease
International Value of Country X's Currency Country X's Exports Decrease Increase
International Value of Country X's Currency Country X's Exports Increase Decrease
International Value of Country X's Currency Country X's Exports Increase Increase
International Value of Country X's Currency Country X's Exports Not change Not change

content.answer: International Value of Country X's Currency Country X's Exports Decrease Increase

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
